alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 4:12PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with up to 6 inches along the immediate Massachusetts and New Hampshire border. Accumulations will be confined to elevations 1000 feet or higher. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Franklin MA and Northern Worcester MA Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The combination of heavy wet snow and winds gusting to 40 mph could result in possible power outages and tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
